title: 4K - Refuge (2010) One RV. One Dead Husband. No Destination | Starring Linda Hamilton

sources.title: 4K - Refuge (2010) One RV. One Dead Husband. No Destination | Starring Linda Hamilton
sources.description:
Amelia hits the road in an RV with her late husband Jack and a very confused hostage, Darryl, aiming for freedom and maybe a little closure. Along the way, this oddball trio dodges cops, awkward questions, and their own messy secrets, proving that lifeâ€™s detours are rarely boring.

Original title: Refuge

Director: Mark Medoff
Writers: Mark Medoff, Phillip Treon

Main cast:
Linda Hamilton - Amelia Philips
Chris Payne Gilbert - Darryl Tripp
Lena Georgas - Helen Kaufman
Christopher McDonald - Jack Phillips
Amy Lanasa - Melodie Semple
Doyle Smith - Officer Gummy

Genres: Comedy, Crime, Drama
Filming location: New Mexico, USA
